name: mickey
greetingText: My favorite bestie of all time!
wishText: May this year be the best year of your life! ;)
textInChatBox: كل سنه و انتي طيبه يا معلمه و يا رب تكوني مبسوطه و سنه سعيده وعقبال سنين .... بلا بلا بلا
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4:
I realised that your are more special than that 
 and that this is حجات أيحه, so I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if is حاجه ايقونيه كفايه.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
